image
Interface ImageReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
JpegReader, GifReader, PngReader
public interface ImageReader

Interface that must be implemented by any image reader. It does not need to be public. It is public to ease the documentation.

Method Summary
 Pixels readPixels(java.lang.String filename)
          Read the pixels of an image.
 

Method Detail

readPixels

public Pixels readPixels(java.lang.String filename)
Read the pixels of an image.
Parameters:
filename - The name of the file containing the pixels.
Returns:
The pixels of the image.
